Rust's Timeline - Story Collection

This directory contains Rust's complete timeline from birth through age 13 (campaign start), with each period told as a narrative story rather than bullet points.

Reading Order

  • 01 - Unknown Origins - Birth to Age 2: The lost years before the monastery
  • 02 - Arrival and Conditioning - Ages 2-5: Arrival and early conditioning
  • 03 - The Gift and the Curse - Age 5: The literacy test that changed everything
  • 04 - Velennes Observation - Ages 6-8: Sister Velenne's systematic testing
  • 05 - Learning Languages - Age 7: Infernal, Goblin, and the weight of words
  • 06 - Survival Strategies - Ages 8-9: Coping mechanisms and mental mapping
  • 07 - Mika Arrives - Age 10: First real friendship
  • 08 - Escalation - Age 11: The punishments intensify
  • 09 - The Final Year - Age 12: Leading up to the awakening
  • 10 - The Awakening - Age 12: The night everything changed
  • 11 - First Months Free - Age 12: Immediate aftermath and survival
  • 12 - Sevenarches - Age 12 (6-8 months later): The forest that remembers
  • 13 - Approaching Adulthood - Ages 12-13: The wandering year
  • 14 - Campaign Start - Age 13: Present day, ready to begin

Notes

  • Each file is a standalone narrative that can be read independently
  • Files are interconnected through wiki-style links: [Rust](/Kingmaker/Characters/Rust.html)
  • All events are canon through age 13; no speculation about future levels
  • Content warnings apply throughout for themes of child abuse, trauma, and systematic cruelty

File Structure

Characters/ - Character information files
├── Rust.md - Main character file
├── Rust Timeline/ - This directory
│ ├── Detailed story files for each period
Events/ - Major event files (Awakening, Sevenarches, etc.)
NPCs/ - Sister Velenne, Sister Malhana, Mika
Locations/ - Monastery, Sevenarches, Isger

These stories chronicle a child's survival through systematic abuse, his escape, and his first year of freedom. They are foundational to understanding who Rust is and why he makes the choices he does.
